text: From tap at CBC 2016. Clear golden to amber colour with a white head. Aroma and flavour of apples, spice, oak, citric and mild bourbon taste.

Draught @ CBC 2016 [ Blue Session ]. - Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, Oksnehallen Vesterbro, Halmtorvet 11, 1700 Copenhagen, Denmark. [ As Superstition Pillars of Creation ].Clear medium red orange color with a small, fizzy, fair lacing, mostly diminishing, off-white head. Aroma is moderate to heavy apple, cherry, almonds, light vanilla. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average to long duration, almonds, apple, sweet apples - apple pie, vanilla. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft to flat. [20160513]

Red colour, not much head. Aroma is raspberry, some cherries, wood and mild tart wooden notes. Flavour is raisins, cherries, some raspberries and mild floral notes to it.

Draught @ CBC 2016. Pours deep red, no head. Aroma of apples, fruit, light cherry, spicy, cinnamon, vanilla. Flavor is light tart, apples, fruity, cherry, wood, spice, alcohol. Medium body, average carbonation, light acidic finish. 130516
From tap. Pour clear golden amber with a small white head. Aroma is floral and slight herbal. Smooth fruity. Lingering fruity and mellow. Citric and dry fruity. Lingering citric and fruity finish.
Tap @ CBC2016. Pours clear reddish orange. Notes of berries, apples, light sour, vanilla, oaky. Holy shit this is nice!

Draught @ CBC 2016, Blue session, København
Pours orange with a few off-white bubbles. Aroma has notes of berry, apple, vanilla, cherry and hint of sourness. Taste is medium sweet and light to medium sour with a long vanilla, apple, cherry and tart finish. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is soft.
CBC. Red with no head. Arom ais malt, apples, spices, cherries and wood. Flavour is malt, apples, cherries, spices, wood, vanilla, tart and sweet.
CBC. Hazy red with a tiny white head. Aroma is sweet, apples, cherries and light wood. Flavor is quite sweet and light acidic. Sweet and light acidic finsh. 130516
Tap @ CBC 16. Pours red with no head. Aroma of cherry, vanilla, honey, apples and slight bourbon tannins. The taste has cherry, vanilla and is overall tart, fresh and juicy despite being sweet.
[5/13/16] Draught sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Blue session. Red. Aroma of apples, cherries, vanilla, oak. Tart-sweet flavor with apples, cherries, and some vanilla. Very good.
Sample at CBC 2016 Blue Session. Pours reddish with no head. Slightly tart cherries with honey, vanilla, red apple and some floral notes.
Sample @ CBC16, Copenhagen. Blue session. Reddish, pink pour with no head. Notes of sour cherries, red apples, honey and some vanilla sweetness.
Sample at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Slightly hazy red. Short ring of head. Warming taste in which the barrel notes come through. Lots of tart cherries on the tongue. Dry finish. Very tasty.

On tap at Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Rose coloured with a soft carbonation. Aroma is cherry candy, apple juice. Full bodied, sticky mouthfeel, sickly sweet on the palate. Taste is cherry candy, apple juice, hint of bourbon
Tap @CBC16. Clear dark amber, no head. Apple, caramel and light bourbon aroma. Apple flavour, notes of wood and vanilla. Elegant.

Blue session, Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016. Clear reddish beer with a small head. Sourish apple aroma, fruity, raspberries, some caramel. Fruity sourish flavor, apples, grapes, some floral notes. Quite nice.
CBC2016. Fast klare dunkel orange goldene Farbe, geringe weiße Schaumkrone. Geruch süß, Honig, Trauben. Geschmack süß, Honig, Trauben, rote Früchte.
Keg at cbc16... Pink red... Thin pink lacing.. Soft dry honey fruit nose... Odd zezty peppery fruit.. Light sweet honey

@Copenhagen Beer Celebration 2016, BLUElight reddy colour, slight hazy. Nice pencils, woody nose. Ripe fruity, some currants. Intense body. Med bodied, long finish with a slighttart dry touch. Sweets, fruity currants. Excellent drink.-- rated with beerbasher/winphone

13.05.2016, tap @ CBC:
Small slightly bubbly shortlasting head, light orangy color. Aroma is slightly dry and fresh fruity, dry apples, apple cores, oak, red berries, sour grass, apple peel. Taste is slightly sweet sour-ish fruity, red berries, concentrated apple juice, oak, fruit stones, grass, hints of caramel and vanilla. Medium bitterness, slightly dry mouthfeel. Nice.

On tap @ CBC 2016. Slightly hazy pink-hued amber body, no head. Nose is cinnamon, rose water, red berries, apples and hints of cardamum and honey. Taste is red berries, tart apple juice, citric tones and hints of cinnamon and spices. Medium to light body, medium carbonation. Lovely tart and fruity cider with lots of spicey complexity.
Tap at CBC2016, Copenhagen. Colour is clear light red with small white head. Aromas and flavors: Berries, sweetness and some apples.
Tap@ CBC 2016. Nice amber, clear color. Honey, apple peel, light soury notes. Sour flavor, berries, ripe fruits. Very interesting.
Pours clear light red with flat head. Aroma of honey, mead, sweet berries. Taste is rich tart with light sweet finish. Light and smooth body with average carbonation.
Clear light red pour at the meadery. Lightly carbonated. Really nice tart cherry nose with a hint of bourbon. Jammy, rich, tart, warm, slight bourbon on the finish. Awesome.
Smells like bubblegum. Taste is super rich cherry and sharp apple cider. Medium body with crisp sharp carbonation.
Tart cherries jump out and scares the living you know what of my taste buds. I get hints of oak and some spice as well. Nice over all cider!

Tap. Pours clear deep red, no head or lacing. Aroma is cherry and ale, faint oak. Flavor is whoah, medium tart, tons of cherry, hints of bourbon and red apples. Some sweetness as well. Medium body, lingering cherry tartness. Yum.
Bottle at Superstition. Pours a clear ruby with no head. The aroma is strong cherry skin and berries. Thin mouth tart cherry, light jam, hides booze well, very nice.
Reddish pour. Wow. Just wow. The cherry flavor is so concentrated and delicious. The perfect sweet/tart mix. Simply a beautiful cider. Incredible.
